title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Pt 2. Ryen Russillo on NBA 75th Team, NFL/NBA Trends, Draft Pick Value, Retirement
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Pt 2. Ryen Russillo on NBA 75th Team, NFL/NBA Trends, Draft Pick Value, Retirement
description:
In Part 2 of Colin's interview with Ryen Russillo - Host of the Ryen Russillo Podcast - the two continue their discussion and touch on why the NBA 75th Anniversary team was so good for the league (3:00), the evolution of the NBA game from brutally physical to hyper-skilled (9:00), why today's NFL and NBA GM's are more willing to trade 1st round picks than ever before (11:00), if Colin will ever fully retire, retire (19:00), when Russillo first thought about moving to LA (26:00), and if U.S. Presidents should be paid like major sports league commissioners (30:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
